com.tumblr.backboard.imitator

Class EventImitator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.Imitator
      • com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.EventImitator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MotionImitator, ToggleImitator

    public abstract class EventImitator
extends Imitator
    Maps a MotionEvent to a Spring, although it does not pick a property to map.

    Created by ericleong on 5/30/14.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.tumblr.backboard.imitator.Imitator

        FOLLOW_EXACT, FOLLOW_SPRING, mFollowStrategy, mRestValue, mSpring, mTrackStrategy, TRACK_ABSOLUTE, TRACK_DELTA

        protected EventImitator(double restValue,
             int trackStrategy,
             int followStrategy)
        Constructor. Note that the spring must be set with Imitator.setSpring(Spring).

        Parameters:
        offset - the value offset
        value - the current value
        delta - the change in the value
        dt - the change in time
        event - the motion event
